levels.description: Next attack causes 2 additional aftershocks and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> all targets for <@ba.vup>{stun_duration}</>s. This attack has a <@ba.vup>slightly increased</> splash area, and aftershock damage becomes <@ba.vup>{append_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK.
